title: The Mystery Mystery Gift
body:
It was a cold NZ night. Listening to Coldplay "Violet Hill" I logged on to League Of Legends at 7:50pm NZDT, 17th of August year 2015. I received a mystery gift. I don't know why. The strangest thing of all.... It was from the big Riot Games... Shining so bright it said "Molten Rammus". "I am so geraaaatful I saw diss" was my initial reaction. We need an explanation. Why, what , who, when, how. All those English keywords they taught you in primary. Phone records, emails, addresses... The cliché investigation on a person or crime. 
Someone out there knows.....

replies.body: You should submit this for the Astrid Lindgren Memorial Award for youth literature
Did you buy 6 mystery gifts last weekend?
It seems so, could that be related to the Case of the Mystery Mystery Gift?
